title: nothing
body:
hi rito
my little brother play with my acc and he open my capsule and unlock aurelion sol
and like this champ
i wait to buy aatrox
but my little brother unlock aurelion
rito
can you give me back my 6300 be
plsss
{{champion:136}} 
{{champion:266}}

replies.body: Heya, we don't change contents inside capsules but you'll find more as you continue to level up.  As a heads up, we don't support account sharing so be super careful.  Someone else playing on your account can cause potential issues, like this, or worse.  Change your password, have your bro make his own account, and stay safe!
